name: Mesih
summary:
Can you convince the whole world?

A new belief has emerged, and you have been chosen to spread it. Humanity will always have reasons to hate you, so you must use your words, miracles, and improvements to make your religion believed worldwide. You should talk to people without earning their hatred, travel through cities, and correct mistakes with your miracles.

In your journey starting from Egypt, Jerusalem, or Rome, you will encounter hundreds of stories and people. While trying to spread your belief worldwide, you will reach one of twenty different endings.

Throughout your adventure, you can develop yourself to reach more believers, perform miracles, and create disasters to enhance your religion.

As the effects of your words create chaos in the world, you must create a religion that all of humanity believes in by dealing with people's hatred, lies, kings, and demons.
